description.summary: GNU TLS library - C++ runtime library
description.p: GnuTLS is a portable library which implements the Transport Layer Security (TLS 1.0, 1.1, 1.2) and Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) 3.0 and Datagram Transport Layer Security (DTLS 1.0, 1.2) protocols.
This package contains the C++ runtime libraries.
